fieldUpdates.formula: CASE(TEXT(Draw_Period__c), "6 Months", DATE(IF(MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 6)) = 12, YEAR(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 6)) + 1, YEAR(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 6))),IF(MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 6)) = 12, 1, MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 6)) + 1),1), "9 Months", DATE(IF(MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 9)) = 12, YEAR(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 9)) + 1, YEAR(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 9))),IF(MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 9)) = 12, 1, MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 9)) + 1),1), "12 Months", DATE(IF(MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 12)) = 12, YEAR(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 12)) + 1, YEAR(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 12))),IF(MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 12)) = 12, 1, MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 12)) + 1),1), "15 Months", DATE(IF(MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 15)) = 12, YEAR(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 15)) + 1, YEAR(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 15))),IF(MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 15)) = 12, 1, MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 15)) + 1),1), "18 Months", DATE(IF(MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 18)) = 12, YEAR(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 18)) + 1, YEAR(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 18))),IF(MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 18)) = 12, 1, MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 18)) + 1),1), "21 Months", DATE(IF(MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 21)) = 12, YEAR(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 21)) + 1, YEAR(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 21))),IF(MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 21)) = 12, 1, MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 21)) + 1),1), "24 Months", DATE(IF(MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 24)) = 12, YEAR(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 24)) + 1, YEAR(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 24))),IF(MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 24)) = 12, 1, MONTH(ADDMONTHS(CloseDate, 24)) + 1),1), Null)
fieldUpdates.name: UpdateRequestedPeriodNumberField

fieldUpdates.formula: CASE(Draw_Period__c, "6 Months", 180, "9 Months", 270, "12 Months", 365, "15 Months", 450, "18 Months", 540, 0)
fieldUpdates.name: Update Advance Period Days

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Term_Loan', 't00' + Deal_Loan_Number__c, IF(RecordType.DeveloperName == 'LOC_Loan', Deal_Loan_Number__c + '000', IF(RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Single_Asset_Bridge_Loan', 'SAB' + Deal_Loan_Number__c, Yardi_ID__c) ) )

rules.description: Remove the Defaulted values for non-Renovation Bridge Deals.

rules.fullName: CRE%2FBuild for Rent Deal Submitted in UW
rules.description: Email alert to Eileen McDonald when a CRE or Build for Rent deal is submitted to underwriting
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(LOC_Loan_Type__c, "Multifamily/CRE"), ISPICKVAL(LOC_Loan_Type__c, "Build to Rent")), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Submitted to Underwriting"), ISCHANGED(StageName)= TRUE )

rules.description: Assigning new discount code when deal closes and Account does not have a HD Discount code.

criteriaItems.value: Single Asset w/ Renovation,iLOC w/ Renovation
Underwriting,Approved by Committee,Closed Won,Expired,Matured,REO,Closed Loan Mod

rules.description: Defaulting values for a Renovation Defaults
Sends email alerts for Expense Deposit and UCC1 Filing Request

rules.fullName: Loan In Default Active Deal Owner
rules.description: Loans in default checkbox checked while deal owner is active

rules.fullName: Loan In Default Inactive Deal Owner
rules.description: Loans in default checkbox checked while deal owner is inactive
Captures date when a deal is in loan processing -- Bridge

rules.fullName: Opportunity Stage Update To Data Tape Received
rules.description: Deal stage updates from Initial Review to Data Tape Received if Data Tape is saved. Based on Total Property field on Deal.
This will set the In Process of Withdrawn or Rejected field to FALSE when a Deal is moved out of UW Hold
Alert to Term Closer when Deposit and Loan type fields are changed.
rules.formula: AND( Record_Type_Name__c = 'Term_Loan', OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Underwriting"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Approved by Committee")), OR( ISCHANGED( Bridge_Borrower__c ) , ISCHANGED( Are_Assets_Coming_Off_Bridge_Line__c ) , ISCHANGED( Term_Borrower__c ) , ISCHANGED( Are_Assets_Being_RFNC_From_Existing_Term__c ) , ISCHANGED( Deposit_Amount_Requested__c ) , ISCHANGED( Deposit_Amount__c) , ISCHANGED( Deposit_Notes__c ) ))

rules.fullName: Update Awaiting Kickoff Call to False
rules.description: If Kickoff_Date__c is set Then update Awaiting_Kickoff_Call__c to false

rules.fullName: Update Internal Referral Fee Field to 20
rules.description: Updates the Deal's Internal Referral Fee field to 20% if the Internal Referral field is populated.

rules.fullName: Update SAR Deal to Closed Won
rules.description: Updates SAR Deals to Closed Won automatically.
Updates SAR Deals to Withdrawn automatically.

rules.formula: OR( ISNEW(), OR(ISCHANGED( Draw_Period__c ), ISCHANGED( CloseDate )) )
